communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All communication between the Village of Fox Lake and the Mineola Owners/Property including code enforcement violations and purchasing/real estate development from 2020 to present. All code enforcement violations of the property and fines/fees levied and paid.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Daelon

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Attorney Invoices for Real Estate
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All attorney invoices regarding real estate issues including but not limited to real estate development, real estate purchasing, code enforcement etc. from 2020 to present.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Daelon

communications.subject: Illinois Freedom of Information Act. Request: Attorney Invoices/Payments
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Illinois Freedom of Information Act., I hereby request the following records:

All attorney invoices regarding labor and employment issues from 2015 to present. This includes the village attorney as well as any other special counsel such as the labor/employment attorney.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Daelon

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Chainalysis Correction on North Korea
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Communication between the blockchain surveillance provider Chainalysis and the Dept of Treasury notifying the Dept of Chainalysis' recent correction of laundered cryptocurrency funds attributed to North Korea/DPRK from $1B down to $660M (please find the corresponding statement here: https://www.chainalysis.com/blog/crypto-hacking-stolen-funds-2025/)

As an independent journalist I asked that all fees be waived.

Please note that the records requested are supplemental to information already in the public domain. Under Executive Order 13526, Section 1.7, classified information that is already publicly available or improperly classified to conceal violations of law, inefficiency, or administrative error cannot be withheld under Exemption 1.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Lola Leetz
